Package projeto_ed.Game

Class Map

java.lang.Object
projeto_ed.Graphs.Graph<Vertex>
projeto_ed.Graphs.Network<Vertex>
projeto_ed.Game.Map
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMap, GraphADT<Vertex>, NetworkADT<Vertex>
public class Map extends Network<Vertex> implements IMap
The Map class represents a map with vertices and adjacency matrix. It allows creating a map with a specified number of vertices.

    • generateRandomCompleteDirectionalGraph

      public void generateRandomCompleteDirectionalGraph(int taxaCobertura)
      Description copied from interface: IMap
      Generates a random directed complete graph with a specified coverage rate. The method populates the adjacency matrix with random distances between vertices, ensuring that the graph remains directed and complete until it is connected.
      Specified by:
      generateRandomCompleteDirectionalGraph in interface IMap
      Parameters:
      taxaCobertura - The coverage rate indicating the likelihood of creating an edge between vertices (0 to 100).

    • generateRandomCompleteNonDirectionalGraph

      public void generateRandomCompleteNonDirectionalGraph(int taxaCobertura)
      Description copied from interface: IMap
      Generates a random undirected complete graph with a specified coverage rate. The method populates the adjacency matrix with random distances between vertices, ensuring that the graph remains undirected and complete until it is connected.
      Specified by:
      generateRandomCompleteNonDirectionalGraph in interface IMap
      Parameters:
      taxaCobertura - The coverage rate indicating the likelihood of creating an edge between vertices (0 to 100).
